sweetheart.translation[0].definitions[0]: a way of speaking to someone you love
sweetheart.translation[0].definitions[1]: an informal way of speaking to a woman you do not know, which some women find offensive
sweetheart.translation[1].definitions[0]: a sweetheart deal, contract, agreement etc is unfair because it gives people who know each other well or have a lot of influence an unfair advantage
Some executives have been taking kickbacks from suppliers and accepting sweetheart deals.
Critics say prosecutors gave him asweetheart sentence (=a very short one) in return for evidence against his partner.
